title: ISurfaceExtendFeatureData.IGetPropagatingEdges
description: Gets the propagating edges for this surface-extend feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of propagating edges of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISurfaceExtendFeatureData::GetPropagatingEdgesCount
before calling this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
